response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business operations. Given its high value and utility, I'm offering it to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is an exceptional opportunity considering its market value stands at $10,000, and it's significantly below my usual selling price of $12,000. I trust this offer will be attractive to you, given the substantial savings compared to the alternative of purchasing elsewhere or at full price. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 9500}
